document.full_text: roberto luongo produced 20 saves to back-stop the vancouver canucks to a 1-0 win over the nashville predators in the first game of their western conference semi-final series thursday.
document.title: canucks can predators 1-0 in series opener
lines_and_colors: roberto luongo produced 20 saves to back-stop the vancouver canucks to a 1-0 win over the nashville predators in the first game of their western conference semi-final series thursday.
